meanings.definition: To drink or consume quickly and eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The thirsty dog was guzzling water from his bowl.
meanings.sent2: She was guzzling her soda while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The baby guzzled his milk so fast, he got a milk mustache!
meanings.sent4: The engine guzzled gas like a thirsty camel in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The kids guzzled down the lemonade at the picnic.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking or consuming quickly and eagerly.
meanings.sent1: His guzzling of the juice surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The loud guzzling of the water could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent3: The guzzling of popcorn at the movie theater was like music to his ears.
meanings.sent4: The guzzling of resources by the company led to its downfall.
meanings.sent5: The guzzling of candy at Halloween left him with a stomachache.
